member.name: M:API.Controllers.CategoryController.GetCategories(Application.Queries.Category.GetCategories.GetCategoriesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GET categories based on previously informeted filters. Required at least a filter as parameters.
member.returns: Return a list of categories based on pre determined filters.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ReceiptController.GetVariableReceipts(Application.Queries.Receipt.GetVariableReceipts.GetVariableReceiptsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GET variable expenses based on previously informed filters. Required at least one filter as parameters.
member.returns: Returns a list of expenses receipts based on predetermined filters.

member.name: M:API.Controllers.ReceiptController.GetRecurringReceipts(Application.Queries.Receipt.GetRecurringReceipts.GetRecurringReceiptsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: GET recurring expenses based on previously informed filters. Required at least one filter as parameters.s
member.returns: Returns a list of expenses receipts based on predetermined filters.
